definition[0]: used to say that it does not matter who does something, is in a particular place etc
example[0]: I’ll take whoever wants to go.
example[1]: When you’re done with the book, just give it to Kristin or Shelley or whoever.
definition[1]: used to talk about a specific person or people, although you do not know who they are
example[2]: Whoever is responsible for this will be punished.
definition[2]: used to mean ‘who’ at the beginning of a question to show surprise or anger
example[3]: Whoever would do a thing like that to an old woman?
